順.definition: to obey; to follow; to arrange; to make reasonable; along; favorable

順便.definition: conveniently; in passing; without much extra effort

順其自然.definition: to let nature take its course (idiom)

順勢.definition: to take advantage; to seize an opportunity; in passing; without taking extra trouble; conveniently

順化.definition: Hue, city in central Vietnam and capital of Thua Thien province

順口.definition: to read smoothly (of text); to blurt out (without thinking); to suit one's taste (of food)

順口溜.definition: popular piece of doggerel; common phrase repeated as a jingle

順嘴.definition: to read smoothly (of text); to blurt out (without thinking); to suit one's taste (of food)

順嘴兒.definition: to read smoothly (of text); to blurt out (without thinking); to suit one's taste (of food)

順城.definition: Shuncheng, a district of Fushun 撫順市|抚顺市[Fu3shun4 Shi4], Liaoning

順城區.definition: Shuncheng, a district of Fushun 撫順市|抚顺市[Fu3shun4 Shi4], Liaoning

順導.definition: to guide sth on its proper course; to guide towards profitable outcome

順帶.definition: (do sth) in passing; incidentally (while doing sth else)

順平.definition: Shunping county in Baoding 保定[Bao3 ding4], Hebei

順平縣.definition: Shunping county in Baoding 保定[Bao3 ding4], Hebei

順式.definition: cis- (isomer) (chemistry); see also 反式[fan3 shi4]

順從.definition: obedient; to comply; to submit; to defer

順德.definition: Shunde, a district of Foshan 佛山市[Fo2shan1 Shi4], Guangdong

順德區.definition: Shunde, a district of Foshan 佛山市[Fo2shan1 Shi4], Guangdong

順慶.definition: Shunqing district of Nanchong city 南充市[Nan2 chong1 shi4], Sichuan

順慶區.definition: Shunqing district of Nanchong city 南充市[Nan2 chong1 shi4], Sichuan

順應.definition: to comply; to conform to; in tune with; adapting to; to adjust to

順應不良.definition: inability to adjust; unable to adapt

順應天時.definition: going with nature and the seasons (TCM)

順我者昌逆我者亡.pinyin: shun4 wo3 zhe3 chang1 ni4 wo3 zhe3 wang2
順我者昌逆我者亡.definition: submit to me and prosper, or oppose me and perish

順手.definition: easily; without trouble; while one is at it; in passing; handy

順手兒.definition: handy; convenient and easy to use; smoothly

順手牽羊.definition: lit. to lead away a goat while passing by (idiom); fig. to opportunistically pocket sb's possessions and walk off

順拐.definition: to swing the arm and leg on the same side of the body together while walking

順昌.definition: Shunchang county in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2], Fujian

順昌縣.definition: Shunchang county in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2], Fujian

順水人情.definition: to do sb a favor at little cost

順水推舟.definition: lit. to push the boat with the current; fig. to take advantage of the situation for one's own benefit

順水推船.definition: lit. to push the boat with the current; fig. to take advantage of the situation for one's own benefit

順河區.definition: Shunhe Hui district of Kaifeng city 開封市|开封市[Kai1 feng1 shi4], Henan

順河回族區.definition: Shunhe Hui district of Kaifeng city 開封市|开封市[Kai1 feng1 shi4], Henan

順治.definition: reign name of second Qing emperor (1644-1662)

順治帝.definition: Fulin Emperor Shunzhi (1638-1662), second Qing emperor, reigned 1644-1662

順理成章.definition: logical; only to be expected; rational and clearly structured (of text)

順產.definition: to give birth without complications; easy childbirth; safe delivery; natural birth (without surgical operation)

順眼.definition: pleasing to the eye; nice to look at

順稿.definition: to edit a text for readability

順藤摸瓜.definition: lit. to follow the vine to get to the melon; to track sth following clues

順行.definition: circular motion in the same sense as the sun; clockwise

順路.definition: by the way; while out doing sth else; conveniently

順遂.definition: everything is going smoothly; just as one wishes

順風耳.definition: sb with preternaturally good hearing (in fiction); fig. a well-informed person

順風車.definition: vehicle that gives one a free ride; (fig.) (ride on sb's) coattails; (take advantage of) an opportunity

順風轉舵.definition: to act according to whatever is the current outlook; pragmatic; unprincipled
